name: search-drugs
description: Search for drug information using FDA database

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Drug name to search for (brand name or generic name)

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of results to return (1-50, default: 10)

name: get-drug-details
description: Get detailed information about a specific drug by NDC (National Drug Code)

arguments.name: ndc
arguments.desc: National Drug Code (NDC) of the drug

name: get-health-statistics
description: Get health statistics and indicators from WHO Global Health Observatory

arguments.name: indicator
arguments.desc: Health indicator to search for (e.g., 'Life expectancy', 'Mortality rate')

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of results to return (1-20, default: 10)

name: search-medical-literature
description: Search for medical research articles in PubMed

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Medical topic or condition to search for

arguments.name: max_results
arguments.desc: Maximum number of articles to return (1-20, default: 10)

name: get-article-details
description: Get detailed information about a specific medical article by PMID

name: search-drug-nomenclature
description: Search for drug information using RxNorm (standardized drug nomenclature)

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Drug name to search for in RxNorm database

name: search-google-scholar
description: Search for academic research articles using Google Scholar

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Academic topic or research query to search for

name: search-clinical-guidelines
description: Search for clinical guidelines and practice recommendations from medical organizations

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Medical condition or topic to search for guidelines

arguments.name: organization
arguments.desc: Specific medical organization to filter by (e.g., 'American Heart Association', 'WHO')

name: check-drug-interactions
description: Check for potential drug-drug interactions between two medications

name: search-medical-databases
description: Search across multiple medical databases (PubMed, Google Scholar, Cochrane, ClinicalTrials.gov) for comprehensive results

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Medical topic or condition to search for across multiple databases

name: search-medical-journals
description: Search specific medical journals (NEJM, JAMA, Lancet, BMJ, Nature Medicine) for high-quality research

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Medical topic or condition to search for in top medical journals
